SEARCH
Package data_managers

Class MovieManager

java.lang.Object
data_managers.MovieManager
public class MovieManager extends Object
The MovieManager class takes care of interacting with the file where the movies are stored. It performs writing, updating, reading and searching in the movies' storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieManager

      public MovieManager()

  • Method Details

    • readMovies

      public static ArrayList<Movie> readMovies()
      The readMovies function reads all movies records from the movies' storage.
      Returns:
      An array list of the movies records from the storage. Empty array list if not any.

    • writeMovie

      public static boolean writeMovie(Movie movie)
      The writeMovie function adds a movie record to the movies' storage.
      Parameters:
      movie - The movie record to be written in the storage.
      Returns:
      true if the movie record is added successfully. false if writing failed.

    • getMovie

      public static Movie getMovie(String title)
      The getMovie function searches for a movie with the same title in the storage and provides their record.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the movie that we search
      Returns:
      The record of the movie with the same title. null if a movie with this title does not exist.

    • updateMovie

      public static boolean updateMovie(Movie movie)
      The updateMovie function searches if the provided movie record exists and if so updates their entry.
      Parameters:
      movie - The movie record to be updated in the storage.
      Returns:
      true if the movie record is updated successfully. false if updating failed.

    • deleteMovie

      public static boolean deleteMovie(Movie movie)
      The deleteMovie function searches if the provided movie record exists and if so deletes their entry.
      Parameters:
      movie - The movie record to be deleted in the storage.
      Returns:
      true if the movie record is deleted successfully. false if deletion failed.
